fields.plot: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.
fields.title: Don Jon

fields.plot: A re-creation of the merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.
fields.title: Rush

fields.plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?
fields.title: Prisoners

fields.plot: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.
fields.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire

fields.plot: Faced with an enemy that even Odin and Asgard cannot withstand, Thor must embark on his most perilous and personal journey yet, one that will reunite him with Jane Foster and force him to sacrifice everything to save us all.
fields.title: Thor: The Dark World

fields.plot: While attending a party at James Franco's house, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel and many other celebrities are faced with the apocalypse.
fields.title: This Is the End

fields.plot: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.
fields.title: Insidious: Chapter 2

fields.plot: United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.
fields.title: World War Z

fields.plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past to change a major historical event that could globally impact man and mutant kind.
fields.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past

fields.plot: A mechanic and his daughter make a discovery that brings down Autobots and Decepticons - and a paranoid government official - on them.
fields.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction

fields.plot: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.
fields.title: Now You See Me

fields.plot: A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.
fields.title: Gravity

fields.plot: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
fields.title: We're the Millers

fields.plot: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.
fields.title: Riddick

fields.plot: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging as their old habits die hard.
fields.title: The Family

fields.plot: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction.
fields.title: Star Trek Into Darkness

fields.plot: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.
fields.title: After Earth

fields.plot: A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.
fields.title: The Great Gatsby

fields.plot: The story of a young lesbian couple's beginning, middle and possible end.
fields.title: La vie d'Adèle

fields.plot: Beatrice Prior, a teenager with a special mind, finds her life threatened when an authoritarian leader seeks to exterminate her kind in her effort to seize control of their divided society.
fields.title: Divergent

fields.plot: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.
fields.title: We Are What We Are

fields.plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
fields.title: Iron Man 3

fields.plot: Spider-Man squares off against the Rhino and the powerful Electro while struggling to keep his promise to leave Gwen Stacey out of his dangerous life.
fields.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

fields.plot: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.
fields.title: Curse of Chucky

fields.plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
fields.title: The Conjuring

fields.plot: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked up into solitary confinement for 20 years without reason.
fields.title: Oldboy

fields.plot: When a structural-security authority finds himself incarcerated in a prison he designed, he has to put his skills to escape and find out who framed him.
fields.title: Escape Plan

fields.plot: Set in the year 2154, where the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth, a man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.
fields.title: Elysium

fields.plot: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
fields.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2

fields.plot: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) - a loving husband, father and good cop - is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.
fields.title: RoboCop

fields.plot: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.
fields.title: Carrie

fields.plot: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called Downworld.
fields.title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones

fields.plot: Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world and teams up with Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, to battle a powerful yet shadowy enemy in present-day Washington, D.C.
fields.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier

fields.plot: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.
fields.title: Need for Speed

fields.plot: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.
fields.title: Runner Runner

fields.plot: Battle of the Year attracts all the best teams from around the world, but the Americans haven't won in fifteen years. Dante enlists Blake to assemble a team of the best dancers and bring the Trophy back to America where it started.
fields.title: Battle of the Year

fields.plot: Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted.
fields.title: Behind the Candelabra

fields.plot: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.
fields.title: No se Aceptan Devoluciones

fields.plot: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.
fields.title: The Bling Ring

fields.plot: Hobbs has Dom and Brian reassemble their crew in order to take down a mastermind who commands an organization of mercenary drivers across 12 countries. Payment? Full pardons for them all.
fields.title: Furious 6

fields.plot: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.
fields.title: Machete Kills

fields.plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
fields.title: 12 Years a Slave

fields.plot: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.
fields.title: The World's End

fields.plot: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.
fields.title: Pitch Perfect

fields.plot: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group characters in order to save their world -- and ours.
fields.title: Epic

fields.plot: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superhumans to save the planet from Loki and his army.
fields.title: The Avengers

fields.plot: Trip, a young roadie for Metallica, is sent on an urgent mission during the band's show. But what seems like a simple assignment turns into a surreal adventure.
fields.title: Metallica Through the Never

fields.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
fields.title: Oblivion
